about_us_contents: We are two souls stood at the crossroads of life, each on a path as different as night and day. One, a wanderer, unsure about love, career, and the future, constantly questioning the world around him. The other, a confident, career-oriented, strong independent woman, with high standards about love.

Our journey began casually— over late-night coffee dates and drinks with friends, though one would only sip a bottle or two, and spontaneous travels with our close circle of friends and us alone. These shared moments, light and carefree, slowly began to deepen. We are drawn to each other's strength and weakness, good and evil, and most of all POV's in life. As time passed, we decided to move in together, testing the depths of our relationship.
We grew stronger, both as partners and as individuals.

The wanderer had found peace in their uncertainty, and the strong independent woman realized that love didn't mean compromising her strength. Together, we balanced each other—one offering steadfast confidence, the other embracing the beauty of life's unknowns.
On the 21st of October 2024, as we celebrate our 9th year anniversary, we are bound to tie a knot at the same time with all our loved ones.

life_highlights.content: Honeymoon in Hong Kong - Disneyland or Boracay

content.bible_quote_verse: WHEN THE TIME IS RIGHT, I, THE LORD, WILL MAKE IT HAPPEN.
content.church_address: Farconville Subd., Brgy. San Francisco, San Pablo City, Laguna
content.reception_address: 0459 Purok 3 Sitio Balanga Barangay San Antonio 1, San Pablo City, Laguna

dress_code.gentlemen_attire: Suit or Long Sleeves and Slacks

content.rsvp_gift_message: With all the blessings that God poured out on us, we cannot ask for more. Your presence and prayers are all we request. But if you desire to bless us, a monetary gift is one we suggest. It would be deeply appreciated.

faqs.question: Gift Guide
faqs.answer: As love is what the day is all about, your presence is one we can't celebrate without. But should you still believe that a gift is worth giving, a monetary gift for our future would be much appreciated.

faqs.question: Attire Guide
faqs.answer: We hope our wedding will be a fun excuse for you to dress up and be fab! There is a color palette to comply with and we highly encourage everyone to dress up appropriately.
faqs.footer: **Strictly: NO slippers, NO Black and White dress, please. THANK YOU!**

faqs.question: RSVP Deadline
faqs.answer: The last day to accept RSVPs is September 28, 2024.

faqs.question: Is there parking space available for my car?
faqs.answer: Yes, there is parking available at the venue. However, please remember it's on a first-come, first-served basis, so you might not want to be late.

faqs.question: I said "YES" to the RSVP but I had a change of plans.  What should I do?
bullets: Unfortunately, we have a strict guest list.
Do not attend unannounced, as we may not have any available seats for you.

faqs.question: Is it okay to skip the ceremony
faqs.answer: We would love you to arrive ON TIME as we put a lot of effort on planning this event.

faqs.question: When is the appropriate time to leave?
faqs.answer: This event took us 6 months to plan. We want you to have fun! Let's laugh, take pictures, make memories, and enjoy the party!

faqs.question: Can we bring our kids to the Wedding?
faqs.answer: This is a strict ADULT-ONLY event. As much as we'd love to celebrate with your kids, only those in the entourage and those specifically requested are invited to our wedding. We hope you understand and still enjoy the event.

faqs.question: How can I help the couple have a great time during their wedding?
bullets: Pray with us for favorable weather and the continuous blessings of our Lord as we enter this new chapter of our lives as husband and wife.
RSVP as soon as your schedule is cleared.
Dress appropriately and follow our wedding motif.
Follow the seating arrangement in the reception.
Stay until the end of the program.

faqs.question: May I invite a "PLUS ONE" to the event?
faqs.answer: As much as we would love to accommodate all our friends and family, we have a limited number of guests. Please understand that this event is strictly by invitation only.
faqs.footer: Guests not found on the guestlist provided to our coordinator will not be allowed to enter.

faqs.question: What if I RSVP'd but cannot attend?
faqs.answer: We would love to have you at our wedding, but we understand that there are circumstances beyond our control. However, please let us know as soon as possible so we can reallocate your seat/s. Give us a toast from afar.

faqs.question: Can I sit anywhere at the reception?
faqs.answer: Please don't. It took us a lot of effort and discussion to finish the seating arrangement which is planned for everyone's convenience and network preference, but there is no need to worry! You'll surely be seated with your friends.
faqs.footer: Our coordinators will gladly assist you in finding your designated seat after registration. Feel free to ask them for assistance and they will gladly help you.

faqs.question: Am I allowed to take pictures and/or videos during the ceremony?
faqs.answer: We have but one plea, please keep our ceremony camera-free. Though our I Do's may be unplugged, our reception is not. So take as many photos and videos as you want during the party and don't forget to tag us.
faqs.footer: Please keep the aisle clear during the bridal entrance.

faqs.question: Do we really need to RSVP? We already said "YES" to the couple.
faqs.answer: Yes, please. We will be needing your formal RSVP to consolidate guest details and finalize the headcount for catering and seating purposes.
